updateStoreDirectly: Update your images, contact info, and operational details.
manageAccountDetails: Update your personal profile and security
settingsHubDesc: Choose a section to manage your preferences and account
managePasswordDesc: Keep your account secure by updating your password
needHelpDesc: Manage your entire presence from one place. Ensure your store data is accurate to improve customer trust and visibility.
manageEmployeesDesc: Manage store staff and their access

view.name: View Store Info
view.description:
• View store profile and QR codes
• Access store contact details
• See basic configuration

update.name: Update Store Info
update.description:
• Modify store name and description
• Update store logo and cover
• Change operating hours and settings

view.name: View Users
view.description:
• Browse customer directory
• View customer profiles and history
• See follower list and statistics

create.name: Invite Users
create.description:
• Add new customer entries
• Manually invite users to the store

update.name: Update Users
update.description:
• Edit customer information
• Modify user status or badges

delete.name: Remove Users
delete.description:
• Remove customer records
• Block users from the store

view.name: View Employees
view.description:
• See list of all staff members
• View employee roles and status

create.name: Create Employees
create.description:
• Add new employees to the team
• Set initial roles and credentials

update.name: Update Employees
update.description:
• Edit staff information
• Change employee roles and permissions
• Reset employee passwords

delete.name: Delete Employees
delete.description:
• Remove employees from the system
• Terminate staff access

view.name: View Products
view.description:
• Browse product catalog and inventory
• View product details and pricing

create.name: Create Products
create.description:
• Add new products to the catalog
• Upload product images
• Set prices and descriptions

update.name: Update Products
update.description:
• Edit existing product details
• Update inventory/stock levels
• Manage product status

delete.name: Delete Products
delete.description:
• Remove products from the catalog
• Delete product media and data

view.name: View Categories
view.description:
• Browse product categories and hierarchy
• View category details

create.name: Create Categories
create.description:
• Create new product categories
• Define category hierarchy

update.name: Update Categories
update.description:
• Edit category names and icons
• Reorder category display sequence

view.name: View Orders
view.description:
• Access the order fulfillment dashboard
• View order lists and details
• Track order history

update.name: Update Order Status
update.description:
• Change order status (Preparing, Ready, etc.)
• Assign delivery drivers
• Update fulfillment notes

cancel.name: Cancel Orders
cancel.description:
• Cancel customer orders
• Process order rejections

view.name: View Analytics
view.description:
• Access sales reports and graphs
• View revenue performance
• See top-selling products

export.name: Export Data
export.description:
• Download analytics data as CSV/Excel
• Generate printable reports

view.name: View Settings
view.description:
• View system-wide settings
• Access roles and permissions
• View store branches and delivery areas

update.name: Update Settings
update.description:
• Modify branch details and delivery areas
• Update delivery fees and thresholds
• Manage system configurations

manage.name: Manage Roles
manage.description:
• Create custom employee roles
• Define permission sets for roles
• Manage team access levels

view.name: View Promo Codes
view.description:
• View active and expired promo codes
• Check usage statistics

create.name: Create Promo Codes
create.description:
• Create new discount coupons
• Set expiry dates and usage limits

update.name: Update Promo Codes
update.description:
• Edit existing promo code details
• Deactivate/Activate coupons

view.name: View Variants
view.description: • View product variant options (Size, Color, etc.)

create.description:
• Define new attribute groups
• Add option values for products

view.name: View Addons
view.description: • See available product addons and extras

• Create new addons with prices
